snippet: THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT--Before Judge BETTS.--The Grand Jury came into Court with true bills in the following cases, viz: The United States vs. Wm. McIntosh and ten others--For making a revolt on board the ship Columbus. The defendants we...
lead_paragraph: THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT--Before Judge BETTS.--The Grand Jury came into Court with true bills in the following cases, viz: The United States vs. Wm. McIntosh and ten others--For making a revolt on board the ship Columbus. The defendants were arraigned, and pleaded not guilty.

headline.main: Article 17 -- No Title; COURT OF GENERAL SESSIONS
